title: MS Dhoni
description: Mahendra Singh Dhoni is an Indian former international cricketer who was captain of the Indian national cricket team in limited-overs formats from 2007 to 2017 and in Test cricket from 2008 to 2014. He is also the current captain of CSK in the IPL.

title: What will it take for India to qualify for the Fifa World Cup?
